name: Flash of the blade (itch)
description:
One blazing flash to balance years

Nothing can move faster than light... but can you move faster than shadow?

This short expirience is created specifically for the 20 second game jam (2022).

Instructions

After the cue swipe your mouse across the screen with the LMB pressed.

P.S.

If you would like to support my future projects, please, consider leaving a few kind words in the comments section. And in case you decide to support me with some cash, it will be greatly appreciated. In any case, thank you for trying this little project! Good luck and remember to keep your sword sharp!
